snippet: HYMAN--Shirley Lorraine, Ph.D.,born October 8,1913, died April 1, 2016. Her 102 years were filled with love, happiness, joie de vivre! Beloved mother to Sally Laura and Judith Isabelle, mother-in-law to Paul Joseph Haskins and much cherished wife of the late Morris Hyman, M.D. She is the Shirley of the YouTube video, "Shirley and Moe", created when she was 100 years young, in which she speaks of her beloved Moe with whom she is now reunited. She was a force of nature! 1/3
lead_paragraph: HYMAN--Shirley Lorraine, Ph.D.,born October 8,1913, died April 1, 2016. Her 102 years were filled with love, happiness, joie de vivre! Beloved mother to Sally Laura and Judith Isabelle, mother-in-law to Paul Joseph Haskins and much cherished wife of the late Morris Hyman, M.D. She is the Shirley of the YouTube video, "Shirley and Moe", created when she was 100 years young, in which she speaks of her beloved Moe with whom she is now reunited. She was a force of nature! 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HYMAN, SHIRLEY LORRAINE, PH.D.
